item.description:
Throw down some strikes (and a drink) at the first of several activity meetups this year. Doesn't matter if you're a beginner or expert, the goal is to have fun and meet new people.

We will meet up in the eating area (look for a table with a meetup sign) at 6, bowl then unwind later. Plan for about $20 for shoe rental and food. Boston Bowl has plenty of parking. If there's interest, we can try other bowling spots later in the year.

 

***ALERT: Vote today to determine what types of meetups we will have this year: http://www.meetup.com/businessnetwork-960/polls/475132/"
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a table with a meetup sign
item.name: Bowling!
